infeed_system.description: Boxes and totes are loaded onto the existing conveyor in a lengthwise orientation. From there, they are directed to their assigned highway line, which transports them to the CBS induct zone in a singulated manner.

inducts.description: Fully automatic induct line accurately and smoothly inducts the parcels onto the Linear CBS, based on their dimensions and weight.

sorter.description: Cross-Belt Sorter captures barcode details and volume data after which it efficiently sorts the boxes and totes into their designated output chutes.

live_chutes.description: Integrated with PVC belt conveyors and TBCs for live loading

collection_chutes.description: Designed to collect and gradually accumulate the parcels

recirculation_line.description: Automatically feeds sortfail parcels back into the Linear CBS. Also integrated with a manual loading point for reprocessed boxes and totes collected from the rejection chute.

infeed_system.overview: System equipped with three infeed conveyors, facilitating movement of shipments from lower level to mezzanine level

inclined_pvc_conveyor.description: Used for smooth conveying over inclined paths

buffer_conveyor.description: Temporarily stores or holds items in controlled manner to manage flow between stages

side_aligner.description: Roller aligner conveyor for parcel alignment

weighing_conveyor.description: Measures weight of materials as they move along conveyor belt

receiving_conveyor.description: Receives and releases products for induction onto CBS

buffer_conveyors.description: Temporarily stores items to manage flow and maintain throughput

linear_sorter.operation: As parcel passes through barcode scanning tunnel, barcodes are scanned and chutes are assigned. Carrier actuates to drop parcel in assigned chute.

live_chute.description: Collection chute brings down sorted parcel and releases to running conveyor for direct loading into trucks

recirculation_line.description: Strategically designed at end of Linear CBS to manage parcels with sorting failures. Automated line gathers and transports sort-failed parcels, refeeding them back without additional manual labor.

manual_refeed_line.description: Integrated with recirculation line to enable reintroduction of rejected parcels that have been manually reprocessed

auto_induct_line.description: Shipments coming from auto infeed conveyors will be inducted on Loop Cross Belt Sorter automatically.

manual_induct_station.description: On mezzanine manual station for induction is planned. Operator will collect the parcels and place directly on the Loop Cross Belt Sorter.

loop_cbs.description: Cross-Belt Sorter efficiently sorts the shipments into their respective output chutes by utilizing sorting logic.

output_chutes.description: Shipments are discharged into double decker types of chutes. Chutes and transferring plates connected to Loop CBS.

spacing_conveyor.description: Variable speed special purpose module that creates space between parcels and regulates feeding

angle_merge_conveyor.description: Incorporates advanced automation to intelligently merge streams into single unified flow

manual_induct_stations.description: Manual induct station planned to induct parcels directly on Cross Belt Sorter by operator

loop_cross_belt_sorter.operation: As shipments pass through barcode scanning tunnel, barcodes are scanned and chutes are assigned. Carrier actuates to drop shipment in assigned chute.

capabilities: Archive shipment images in real time

output_chute.description: Output chute and its accessories in client scope

infeed_from_telescopic_conveyors.description: Shipments are placed in singulation on the telescopic conveyor lines. These shipments are then transported upward via an inclined conveyor to auto induct line.

auto_induct_line.description: Auto Induct line will induct the parcel automatically onto the sorter.

loop_cbs.description: Cross-Belt Sorter efficiently sorts shipments into the appropriate output chutes using sorting logic.

scanning_and_dimensioning_system.description: 5 Side scanning and Dimensioning system are planned on the Cross Belt Sorter system.

manual_infeed_system.design_feature: Allows shipment feeding from both sides while ensuring unobstructed pallet movement

curve_conveyor.description: Robust and easily maintainable with uniquely designed curve and belts for smooth turns

buffer_conveyor.description: Temporarily stores parcels to manage flow when there is mismatch in speeds or capacities
buffer_conveyor.usefulness: Absorbs temporary surges or gaps in flow for smooth continuous process

infeed_with_telescopic_conveyors.tbc_configuration: 2 TBCs per deck with one dock left free between two TBCs

rejection_chute.description: Takes out oversized and overweight parcels to ground floor

spacing_conveyor.description: Variable speed module that creates space between parcels and regulates feeding on weighing conveyor

receiving_conveyor.description: Receives and transfers products from infeed-line into processing line

rejection_chute.functionality: Receiving conveyor runs in reverse for oversized/overweight shipments and drops them in rejection chute

loop_cross_belt_sorter.operation: Shipments pass through barcode scanning tunnel where barcodes are scanned and chutes assigned. Carrier actuates to drop shipment in assigned chute.

live_dock_chute.description: Directly load sorted parcels on telescopic belt conveyor for loose load in trucks

technical_chute.description: Manage rejected parcels, positioned in one zone for ease of operation

leg_guards.location: All legs coming near to pathway only

pathways.description: Allocated pathways for operator and vehicle movement indicated in 3D drawings

training_examples.system_type: Loop Cross-Belt Sorter with VDS and Bagging System

infeed_system.description: System consists of 5 infeed lines for Small and Big Parcels. Shipments will get loaded on their respective infeed lines and will move in the volume distribution loop (VDS).

vds_loop.description: Operators will pick the shipments from the volume distribution loop and load them on the auto-induct lines respectively.

auto_induct.description: Operators will place the shipments on the loading conveyor with barcode facing the topside and then the shipments will get buffered and get intelligently merged on the cross-belt sorter loop.

scanning_on_sorter.description: Once the shipments are on the cross-belt loop, they will pass through a tunnel where the barcodes of the shipments will get scanned from the topside and the volume of the shipments will be captured.

sorting.description: Based on the information gathered for barcode and volume scanning, the shipments will get sorted in their respective collection chute or direct bagging chutes.

bagging_system.description: The bags which are created at direct bagging chutes will be loaded on the bagging conveyor and will be transported to the bagging induct line where the operator will scan the barcodes on the bags and the bags will be autoloaded on the sorter.

bag_sorting.description: Based on the information captured from the barcode scanning, the bags will get sorted into the large shipment chute.

secondary_sorting.description: The operators standing near the collection chutes will pick the bags, scan their barcode once again from their handheld scanner and will place them on their respective pallets for dispatch.

infeed_conveyors.description: Operators will load the shipments and then the shipments will move towards the volume distribution loop

vds_loop_conveyor.description: Bulk materials enter the VDS Loop through infeed conveyors. The loop moves shipments in a loop for operators to pick and place them on induct lines

loading_conveyor.description: Aligns and releases products for induction onto CBS. Initial point of entry where products are collected and conveyed

buffer_conveyors.description: Temporarily stores items to manage flow when there is mismatch in speeds or capacities

intelligent_merge_conveyor.description: Incorporates advanced automation to intelligently merge multiple streams into single unified flow

bag_inducts.operation: Operator standing near induct will scan barcode of bag received from bagging conveyor

main_loop.operation: Parcels pass through barcode scanning tunnel where barcodes and dimensions are scanned. Chutes are assigned based on barcode and dimension information. Carrier actuates to drop shipment in assigned chute.

direct_bagging_chute.description: Planned to sort small shipments directly into bags

collection_chute.description: For big shipments. Shipments get sorted inside collection trolleys from where operator picks shipments, scans barcode with HHT and places on respective pallets

bagging_conveyor.description: System equipped with conveyors which help created bags from direct bagging chute to be conveyed to bag induct

pallets.description: Big shipments/bags sorted in collection chutes picked by operators. Operators use hand-held terminal to scan barcodes
pallets.operation: Hand-held terminal displays pallet position/number where shipment should be placed
pallets.note: Pallets and hand-terminals in client scope

telescopic_belt_conveyor.purpose: Loading of bags/shipments into container at outbound docks
